statements: UPDATE location_marketing_campaigns SET effectiveness = 0.75 WHERE campaign_id = 123;
UPDATE location_marketing_campaigns SET start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE location_marketing_campaigns SET effectiveness = 0.75, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
UPDATE location_marketing_campaigns SET start_date = '2023-01-01', location = 'New York' WHERE campaign_id = 1002;
UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name='Summer Sale Campaign' WHERE campaign_id=1;
UPDATE CampaignStats SET engagement_rate=0.75, conversions=50 WHERE stats_id=3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-15', end_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE CampaignStats SET engagement_rate = 0.75, impressions = 10000, conversions = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 2 AND location_id = 5;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 20000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Locations SET city = 'New York' WHERE location_id = 2;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 15000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE MarketingResults SET revenue_generated = 5000.50, conversion_rate = 0.15 WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND location_id = 201;
UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign', start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Locations SET city = 'New York', state = 'NY' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerInteractions SET timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00', interaction_type = 'Email' WHERE interaction_id = 101;
UPDATE location_data SET interaction_count = 15 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE customer_data SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE location_data SET interaction_count = interaction_count + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_data SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
